CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {North Hub}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {Valley Terminal}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Valley Terminal} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Gate} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Metro Center to North Hub in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from North Hub to South Gate in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Valley Terminal to South Gate in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between South Gate and Valley Terminal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between South Gate and Valley Terminal is {171}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Valley Terminal and Metro Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Valley Terminal and Metro Center is {127}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from North Hub?
SC.A: The total flow output from North Hub is {152}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Valley Terminal?
SC.A: The total flow input by Valley Terminal is {166}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 156? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {171} from {Valley Terminal} to {South Gate}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 9? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {3} from {South Gate} to {Metro Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 58 and 107? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {88} from {Metro Center} to {North Hub}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Valley Terminal to South Gate or from North Hub to South Gate?
NC.A: The flow from {Valley Terminal} to {South Gate} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Metro Center to North Hub, from South Gate to Metro Center, or from South Gate to Valley Terminal?
NC.A: The flow from {Metro Center} to {North Hub} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Metro Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Metro Center} and {Valley Terminal}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Metro Center, Arc Valley Terminal, Arc South Gate, Arc North Hub}.
